NAME: addbank
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to add change to a user's bank.
IS_BOT: Cannot add change to a bot's bank account.
TITLE: Added money on {{username}}'s bank account.
RESULT: You just added {{amount}}ama to the {{user}}'s bank account.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to add money to in their bank.
OPTION_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to add.
